home.title: Chealt
home.mainDescription: This application helps you stay healthy and happy. Look around, you might see something useful.
home.privacyDescription: All the data you enter into the application is stored on your device. There are no cookies, third-party integrations, or anything like that. If there is a feature that requires you to send some data somewhere, we will always ask for your permission and let you know about the consequences.
home.improvementsDescription: If you have an idea how to make this app even more useful, let us know <1>here</2> by creating a <3>GitHub issue</4>.

familyHistory.description: Record your family's medical history to help doctors have a sense of potential hereditary issues you might have.

documents.title: documents
documents.empty: Your uploaded documents will be shown here.
documents.noMatches: No matching documents. Clear filters or try a different term.
documents.openInNewTab: The document is opened in a new tab. If you cannot see it, it is unsupported or it might have been blocked by an ad blocker. Supported image extensions: JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, other extensions: PDF.
documents.confirmDelete: Do you really want to delete the document(s)?

instructions.title: To Share your data with another device, follow these steps
instructions.step2: Wait for the QR code to appear
instructions.step3: Open the <1>Chealt Share page</1> on the device you want to share your data with
instructions.after: After generating a QR code you will have an hour to scan it.
instructions.privacyWarning: <1>PRIVACY WARNING</1>: When using the share functionality, your data temporarily (for an hour) will be stored on our servers.

checkUps.title: Check-ups & Medical Tests
checkUps.tagInstructions: Your Check-ups and medical tests will be shown here. Just tag your document with one of the following: <1>{{tags}}</1>.

vaccinations.name: name
vaccinations.title: vaccinations
vaccinations.emptyVaccinations: Your vaccinations will be shown here.

familyHistory.title: family history
familyHistory.emptyFamilyHistory: Your family history will be shown here.
familyHistory.deleteFailure: Failed to delete family history item(s).

profiles.instructions: You can add multiple profiles to your device here. This way you can manage multiple users' data on a single device.
profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.confirmDelete: Are you sure you would like to delete this profile?

notFound.title: Could not find the page you were looking for.

fitbit.authUrlError: Could not get sign in URL, please refresh the page to try again.
fitbit.authTokenError: Could not sign in with Fitbit or you didn't allow sharing your profile, please try again.
fitbit.authChallengeError: Could not get sign in URL, please refresh the page to try again.
